roleset.name: make seem human or fit for humans
roleset.note: HUMANIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'humanize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from humanize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: make fit
example.text: Council member Joy Picus, the measure's chief advocate, considers it part of a ``pro-family policy'' that [*T*-1]-1 makes Los Angeles a leader in ``[*]-1 humanizing the workplace.''

roleset.name: characterized as a human being
roleset.note: HUMAN-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. Relation to humanize.01 (from human.01-j)
